code: private Exchange createLetter() {     Exchange exchange = context.getEndpoint("direct:a").createExchange().     Message msg = exchange.getIn().     msg.setHeader("firstName", "Claus").     msg.setHeader("lastName", "Ibsen").     msg.setHeader("item", "Camel in Action").     msg.setBody("PS: Next beer is on me, James").     return exchange. }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").to("chunk:letter").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
